dialogue.text: [Earlier today...]
Hey, Sweet, I know this is sudden, but I found a ride to the Preheats.
It’s… a lot to explain, but if it's alright with you and your folks, would I be ok to visit? I think I’ll be able to get there tonight if all goes well.
Oh my gosh! Yes, yes, please do! I'll let my parents know right now, and I’ll make sure everything is prepared for when you arrive!
Oh, word? Sick! Should we meet up somewhere when I get there?
Hmm… oh! I know just the place!
Let’s meet up at Chicory’s Cuisines! It’s a big restaurant right at the border of Corianda and The Preheats, high up top on the mountainside, you can’t miss it!
Oh, also, also! If you get lost on your way through Corianda, just call out for the Wayfinder! He'll be able to help you through. Give him my regards.
…the Wayfinder, huh? Sure, I'll keep that in mind, Sweet. I'll see you then!
See you soon… my love. Eheheh~
Ayy, I see you pulling out the pet names now!
Aye, ye ready to board yet, me boy? We've a long voyage t’go!
Oops, heh, that's my ride all ready. Be there soon, baby.
[Later That Afternoon, at Chicory’s Cuisines…]
Ehehe… father told me this was where he took mother as their first date together.
(Though I suppose this place was more lively all that time ago… Its awfully quiet and empty tonight.)
(I wonder how close Sour is... he hasn't messaged back yet.)
(Ah, what lovely music playing!)
[The sound of the lonesome piano fills the restaurant, Sweet sitting to listen as she waits for her partner.]
[The piano player soon comes to a halt.]
…Not even this… but then… what..?
Ah, bravo!
Hmm...? Apologies, I wasn't anticipating an audience-
I suppose it is a quiet afternoon here, eheh. I didn't mean to startle you, sir.
You… hold on, I recognize you.
Oh? You do?
Ah, yes. I know now. Togarashi Town, just a few weeks earlier from today.
I happened to be in the area as a big crowd gathered around the central gate. You were among a group of other performers there that day, am I correct?
Indeed! Ah, every opportunity I had to perform overseas was a blessing, being able to reach so many new people.
It makes me even more happy to see someone from my hometown here in the Preheats witness it live too!
Ah, I'm… not a Preheats resident myself. I'm just passing through tonight.
Though… Perhaps you can tell me more about this place and what makes it so… special..?
I've heard many things about The Preheats. Supposedly it's a place of great importance. I want to understand why.
Well, there's lots of things that make this place special, at least to me.
I am waiting for someone to arrive, but in the meantime, I wouldn't mind telling you what it's like here. Perhaps you can tell me more about yourself and where you're from as well!
Ah, always forgetting my manners, eheh… My name is Sweet.
Sweet… I see. You may call me Bitter.
